hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Dharr Al-Ghifari that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Indifference towards this world does not mean forbidding what is permitted, or squandering wealth, rather indifference towards this world means not thinking that what you have in your hand is more reliable than what is in Allah’s Hand, and it means feeling that the reward for a calamity that befalls you is greater than that which the calamity makes you miss out on.’”
